Click here to see this page in full context

This action can be used to pause the chosen sound if it is currently playing. Note if you have played multiple instances of the same sound, all of them will be paused, and this does not pause any sounds played after the action has been called. You can start a paused sound playing again using the action Resume Audio.
The above action block code will check a global variable and if it evaluates to <tt>true</tt> then the given sound is paused, otherwise it is resumed.
